import{RECP_ADMIT_PATIENT_FAIL,RECP_ADMIT_PATIENT_REQUEST,RECP_ADMIT_PATIENT_SUCCESS,RECP_ALL_APPOINTMENTS_FAIL,RECP_ALL_APPOINTMENTS_REQUEST,RECP_ALL_APPOINTMENTS_SUCCESS,RECP_DISCHARGE_PATIENT_FAIL,RECP_DISCHARGE_PATIENT_REQUEST,RECP_DISCHARGE_PATIENT_SUCCESS,RECP_GET_ADMIT_PATIENT_FAIL,RECP_GET_ADMIT_PATIENT_REQUEST,RECP_GET_ADMIT_PATIENT_SUCCESS,RECP_GET_DOCTORS_FAIL,RECP_GET_DOCTORS_REQUEST,RECP_GET_DOCTORS_SUCCESS,RECP_MAKE_PAYMENT_REQUEST,RECP_MAKE_PAYMENT_SUCCESS,RECP_MAKE_PAYMENT_FAIL,RECP_VIEW_APPOINTMENTS_FAIL,RECP_VIEW_APPOINTMENTS_REQUEST,RECP_VIEW_APPOINTMENTS_SUCCESS}from"../constants/RecpConstants";import axios from"axios";import{SPRINGURL}from"../constants/URLConstants";export var recpGetDoctorsAction=function recpGetDoctorsAction(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:RECP_GET_DOCTORS_REQUEST});var header={headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};var url=SPRINGURL+"/receptionist/appointments";axios.get(url,header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:RECP_GET_DOCTORS_SUCCESS,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:RECP_GET_DOCTORS_FAIL,payload:error});});};};export var recpViewAppointmentsAction=function recpViewAppointmentsAction(doc_id){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:RECP_VIEW_APPOINTMENTS_REQUEST});var header={headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};var url=SPRINGURL+"/receptionist/appointments/"+doc_id;axios.get(url,header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:RECP_VIEW_APPOINTMENTS_SUCCESS,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:RECP_VIEW_APPOINTMENTS_FAIL,payload:error});});};};export var recpGetAllAppointmentsAction=function recpGetAllAppointmentsAction(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:RECP_ALL_APPOINTMENTS_REQUEST});var header={headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};var url=SPRINGURL+"/receptionist/allAppointments";axios.get(url,header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:RECP_ALL_APPOINTMENTS_SUCCESS,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:RECP_ALL_APPOINTMENTS_FAIL,payload:error});});};};export var recpAdmitPatientAction=function recpAdmitPatientAction(appointment,admitDate,department){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:RECP_ADMIT_PATIENT_REQUEST});var header={headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};var admitPatDetails={appointment:appointment,admitDate:admitDate,department:department};var url=SPRINGURL+"/receptionist/admitPatient";axios.post(url,admitPatDetails,header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:RECP_ADMIT_PATIENT_SUCCESS,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:RECP_ADMIT_PATIENT_FAIL,payload:error});});};};export var recpGetAdmitPatientsAction=function recpGetAdmitPatientsAction(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:RECP_GET_ADMIT_PATIENT_REQUEST});var header={headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};var url=SPRINGURL+"/receptionist/dischargePatient";axios.get(url,header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:RECP_GET_ADMIT_PATIENT_SUCCESS,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:RECP_GET_ADMIT_PATIENT_FAIL,payload:error});});};};export var recpDischargePatientAction=function recpDischargePatientAction(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:RECP_DISCHARGE_PATIENT_REQUEST});var header={headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};var url=SPRINGURL+"/receptionist/dischargePatient/"+id;axios.put(url,header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:RECP_DISCHARGE_PATIENT_SUCCESS,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:RECP_DISCHARGE_PATIENT_FAIL,payload:error});});};};export var recpMakePaymentAction=function recpMakePaymentAction(patientId,apptId,wardCharges,testCharges){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:RECP_MAKE_PAYMENT_REQUEST});var header={headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};var body={apptId:apptId,patientId:patientId,testCharges:testCharges,wardCharges:wardCharges};var url=SPRINGURL+"/receptionist/acceptPayment";axios.put(url,body,header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:RECP_MAKE_PAYMENT_SUCCESS,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:RECP_MAKE_PAYMENT_FAIL,payload:error});});};};
